scripts.clean:npm: find ./ -type f -iname 'package-lock.json' -o -iname 'yarn.lock' | xargs rm && find ./ -name 'node_modules' | xargs rm -rf
scripts.ncu: lerna exec -- ncu -u && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.ncu:minor:deep: npm run clean:npm && ncu -u --semverLevel major && npm install && lerna exec -- ncu '/^@mishguru//' -u --semverLevel major && lerna clean -y && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
